2005- believes Simon Cowell should revoke his recent decision to allow kids as young as 12 to enter the competition, as he thinks 15 or 16 is a more appropriate age. Shayne told Digital Spy: Obviously there are a lot of 12-year-olds over in America who are incredible singers. But I personally think it's too low. It's a completely different world over there.`` With the whole Justin Bieber thing, I can see why lowering the age threshold might be seen as a good thing, but personally I think it should be set at about 15 or 16.
